spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement are highly accurate. Most doors and windows are correctly positioned. Minor scaling issues in the kitchen and utility area (the servant room area is slightly condensed).

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. No missing rooms, no hallucinated structure, and fully compliant background with no text labels or UI elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture mapping. Bed orientations and sofa clusters match the plan perfectly. Kitchen counters are somewhat simplified but representative.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect isometric orthographic perspective. Style is low-poly as requested. Points deducted for slightly complex textures/shading on some wooden furniture which lean away from 'pure' flat colors.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the bottom-left corner (Servant Room and Foyer transition).
Furniture renders include some material depth/textures rather than strictly flat colors.
